Detailed Description

This class defines a super model.

It's not just a model, it's a whole lot more - discrete level of detail, billboards, continuous level of detail, static mesh animations, multi-part animated models - you name it, this baby's got it.

SuperModelActionPtr SuperModel::getAction ( const std::string &  name  ) 

This method gets an action from the SuperModel.

The action is only good for this supermodel - don't try to use it with other supermodels.
